message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a very reasonable price of $170. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Let me know if this is within your range.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $140.  This is a very fair price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product. Let me know if this is feasible for you.
